remark.p: Director, Office of Organization of Economic Cooperation and Development, European Community and Atlantic Political-Economic Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State

Director, Office of OECD European Community and Atlantic Political-Economic Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, 1974â€“1976; thereafter Deputy Assistant Secretary for International Finance and Development and Executive Director, White House Economic Policy Group

Director, Office of Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, European Community and Atlantic Political-Economic Affairs, Bureau of European Affairs, Department of State, until 1977; Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for International Finance and Development; Executive Director, Economic Policy Group, White House Staff, 1977; Deputy Chief of Mission, U.S. Embasssy in Lima from 1977 until 1979
Foreign Service Officer. Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary (Haiti).
